name: SUGAMENIA (gchuso)
description:
This is a demo of Sugamenia, an indie metroidvania game in development.

This version only shows you a small area just to test the new game engine.

Stay tuned and follow the progress in our Twitter https://twitter.com/sugamenia

Legacy project https://gchuso.itch.io/sugamenia-legacy

Thanks for playing! I appreciate your feedback!

CONTROLS

  • Enter - Select menu option
  • C - Jump
  • V - Weapon

CREDITS

Desing, development and graphics by https://twitter.com/gchuso

Music by https://twitter.com/maekshiftmusic
